properties.publicRemarks:
BEVERLY HILLS ADJACENT.  Entire building was just repainted inside and outside and all new carpeting installed throughout.  One third of a block from the Elegant Four Seasons Hotel. Close to Cedars Sinai Hospital and Medical Center! Concierge building with security cameras, Lushly Landscaped grounds, Tennis Court, Pool, Jacuzzi, Laundry Facilities on Every Floor.  Great Amenities! The open floor plan is filled with natural light from 2 separate large-sized sliding large windows/doors in the living room. Sophisticated, airy and completely renewed. Natural Stone Wet Bar in Living Room.  High speed Internet and Cable included. The condo has the Latest, High Quality Luxury flooring, New faucets, shower fixtures, blinds, modern kitchen fixtures & lighting, wall to wall closet system in bedroom, Interiors featuring elegant Venetian Plaster walls, creating a condo that's stylish, elegant & unique. Private patio runs entire length of the unit.

Washer/Dryers are located on each floor. 

Two Parking Spaces & Lockable Storage area Included.

Situated next to the famous FOUR SEASONS HOTEL & RESORT, and surrounded by world-class shopping, restaurants, and close to Cedars-Sinai Hospital & Medical Center.

This Beverly Center Neighborhood also known as BEVERLY HILLS ADJACENT is centrally located just minutes to the best of BEVERLY HILLS, trendy ROBERTSON BLVD, WEST HOLLYWOOD, BEVERLY HILLS, CENTURY CITY and THE GROVE.

Bristol Farms and Ralphs Market are just a few blocks away. MAGNIFICENT WALKING AREA!!!
